announcementDescription.description: Manager Conversation Tool (MCT), your comprehensive solution for a seamless Fiscal Year Roll Out (FYRO) experience! We are excited to introduce this powerful tool designed to enhance your managerial conversations and streamline the process of adapting to FYRO changes.

Announcements.announcementTitle: Timeline chart illustrates the journey of the conversation process in the context from June 29th to July 10th. Each stage represents a milestone in the progression of communication and understanding between the participants.

announcementDescription.description: The timeline refers to the standard Global Conversations including all MCAPS Orgs and Areas and MS FED; exceptions may apply due to local calendar holidays. Reach out to incoming new team members only after you have received notification from Sending Manager that the Sending conversations has happened.

Announcements.announcementTitle: Checklist to be followed by Manager before engaging with Employee. The tasks include “Taxonomy Changes,” “Data Corrections,” “Visa/Immigration,” “Leave of Absence,” “Set FY Context,” and “Make Conversations“

announcementDescription.description: Before you engage with your Employee, check what is changing for your Employee. This understanding will help you to have a more meaningful and productive conversation with your employee. Empathy and active listening are key to effective communication

Announcements.announcementTitle: Change Summary – Summarizes employees joining, leaving, or impacted by taxonomy changes. Current Manager – View or start a conversation, update the reporting manager, or change the taxonomy for direct or indirect reports. Receiving Manager – View or initiate conversation status with new team members, and update the reporting manager or taxonomy. EDM Change Requests – View, approve, reject, or track updates to manager reports and taxonomy corrections

bulletPoints: Change Summary – Summarizes employees joining, leaving, or impacted by taxonomy changes.
Current Manager – View or start a conversation, update the reporting manager, or change the taxonomy for direct or indirect reports.
Receiving Manager – View or initiate conversation status with new team members, and update the reporting manager or taxonomy.
EDM Change Requests – View, approve, reject, or track updates to manager reports and taxonomy corrections.
